| **Date** | **Sign** |
| Dispatch and transport procedure | Is there a documented dispatch and transport procedure in place? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| The company shall have procedures for the dispatch and transport of products, which shall include:  ·  any restrictions on the use of combined loads (e.g. where materials from other companies are in the same transport)  · requirements for the security of products during transit, particularly when vehicles are parked and unattended away from a designated storage depot. |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Is this procedure easily available on the electronic and hard copy format? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Review the header - is it the latest revision, check that the dates and signatures are present on the hard copy Is it a controlled copy |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Up to date records table | Is the Records table up to date? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Record compliance | Select a key Records input and verify compliance.  Correct revision in use?  If records are changed after initial recording/entry, are changes clearly legible (errors marked through and initialed); recorded in ink, not pencil? Free of “correction fluid”? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Natural work group trained | Have the relevant people been trained on this procedure? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Dispatching of products and materials | Are all delivery vehicles and shipping containers subject to a documented hygiene-checking procedure prior to loading? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  | Are all products and materials protected during transit and distribution by external packaging or transported under conditions to protect them from contamination? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are pallets checked? Is there a process to discard damaged, contaminated or unacceptable pallets? Are wooden pallets dry, clean and free from damage and contamination?? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Is there an inspection process for company owned vehicles? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Third-party contractors | Are contracts or agreed terms and conditions, covering the dispatch and transport requirements as per BRC standard, in place for third-party contractors?  When not possible, is the packaging adequate to protect the product against damage, contamination hazards, taint and odor during transit? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Is access to the site for transport drivers controlled? Are facilities provided to negate the need to enter storage or production areas? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
